title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions until al dente.
In a large pan, heat olive oil and butter over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
Pour in heavy cream and simmer for 3-4 minutes.
Add cooked pasta to the sauce and toss to combine.
Remove from heat, add Parmesan cheese and fresh basil.
Season with salt and pepper, serve immediately.
author: Chef Maria

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease two 9-inch round pans.
In a large bowl, whisk together flour, cocoa powder, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, beat eggs, then add buttermilk, oil, and vanilla.
Gradually mix wet ingredients into dry ingredients until smooth.
Divide batter between prepared pans.
Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
Cool completely before frosting.
author: Baker Sarah

title: Fresh Garden Salad
summary: A vibrant and healthy salad packed with fresh vegetables and a zesty homemade dressing.
instructions: Wash and dry all vegetables thoroughly.
In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, cucumber, tomatoes, onion, and bell pepper.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, balsamic vinegar, honey, and Dijon mustard.
Season dressing with salt and pepper.
Drizzle dressing over salad just before serving.
Toss gently to combine and serve immediately.
author: Chef Alex

title: Grilled Chicken Dinner
summary: Perfectly seasoned grilled chicken with herbs and spices, accompanied by roasted vegetables.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
In a small bowl, mix paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, thyme, salt, and pepper.
Rub chicken breasts with olive oil and season with spice mixture.
Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until internal temperature reaches 165°F.
Meanwhile, toss vegetables with remaining olive oil and seasonings.
Grill vegetables for 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally.
Let chicken rest for 5 minutes before serving with grilled vegetables.
author: Chef Mike
